# Reading the excel file

```{r}
library(readxl)
mydiamonds<-read_excel("diamonds.xlsx")
```

# Names of variables

```{r}
names(mydiamonds)
```

# Top 6 observations

```{r}
head(mydiamonds)
```

# Creating a new variable

```{r}
mydiamonds$pricetable<-mydiamonds$price+mydiamonds$table

head(mydiamonds$pricetable)
summary(mydiamonds$pricetable)
```
